source.0d1ffbfc: **Since it is quite slow to manipulate csv data. I am using the parquet dataset created by Rob. You can find the dataset [here](https://www.kaggle.com/robikscube/ubiquant-parquet) and notebook [here](https://www.kaggle.com/robikscube/fast-data-loading-and-low-mem-with-parquet-files/notebook). Also you can read details about parquet [here](https://databricks.com/glossary/what-is-parquet)**
